titleInfo.title: Non-appearance of jurors, State of North Carolina, 1789

subject.topic: Frontier migration/experiments in representative democracy, encounters with Native Americans .

mods.note: This document from Sumner County dates from the time when the area was still part of the state of North Carolina. There is a list of people to be fined 5 pounds - Samuel Hays, Alexander Hamilton, John Hickson, James Odam, William Maxwell, David Hughs, Matthew Kuykendall and George Martin. It is dated 14 October 1789, 14th year of Independence.
The University of Tennessee Libraries (Knoxville, Tennessee) is the digital publisher.

titleInfo.title: Digital Collection: The Growth of Democracy in Tennessee: A Grassroots Approach to Volunteer Voices
